title: Maintenance in-progress
content: QuickCheckout is moving to better environment. Upgrade is expected to complete by 9PM on 23-Nov-2020. Please come back again. Thanks

title: Sleeping
content: QuickCheckout is sleeping to save the resources. Please use the app between 7AM to 11PM.

title: Update Required
content: Currnet version of the App is no longer supported. Please update the app

title: Alert
content: Due to COVID-19. Order deliveries are delayed. Please co-operate
